fullplot: Charlyne Yi embarks on a quest across America to make a documentary about the one subject she doesn't fully understand: Love. Michael Cera becomes the object of her affection. Weaving together reality and fantasy, Paper Heart combines elements of documentary and traditional storytelling to get at modern romance.
plot: Charlyne Yi embarks on a quest across America to make a documentary about the one subject she doesn't fully understand: Love.
title: Paper Heart

tomatoes.consensus: Equal parts charming and refreshing, Paper Heart is a quirky mockumentary led by the endearing Charlyne Yi.
